id: scenario-value-scanner-grandparent-scenarios-neighborhood-sharing traditional skills and knowledge with neighbors
title: Sharing traditional skills and knowledge with neighbors
description: Sharing traditional skills and knowledge with neighbors
content:
Scenario: Sharing traditional skills and knowledge with neighbors
    Given Margaret has skills from her generation (cooking, gardening, crafts)
    And neighbors might benefit from this knowledge
    When the neighborhood_elohim tracks knowledge sharing
    Then it should recognize Margaret's teaching as care work
    And it should facilitate skill-sharing opportunities
    And it should connect Margaret with neighbors wanting to learn
    And traditional knowledge should be valued and transmitted
    And neighborhood should benefit from elder skills and wisdom
    And Margaret's teaching should accumulate care tokens
